recipesJson.name: French Cranberry Parfait (Ice Cream)
recipesJson.author: besejuiced
recipesJson.description:
Do you guys have moments that just transports you back to your childhood? This is one of mine.

So I decided to reproduce a cranberry infused ice cream vape.

For the French parfait glacé (ice Cream base) i used the usual egg yolk-thickened pudding from FLV Vanilla Pudding and FA Gelato Vaniglia.
I needed some tartness to balance the sugar and cream, so i layered FLV Apple Cranberry with FLV Cranberry and a pinch of FLV Berry Blend. It compliments this recipe beautifully. 
It is certainly a magical combination.

No extra sweetness needed in this one.
Give it 5 day's to blend and you get a very rewarding and refreshing French parfait glacé. 

Enjoy
